title: The Wizard's Gambit
subtitle: A tale of wishes, the Amnesiac's cost, and the Evil Saint.

beats.title: Pre-Game: The Grimoire Is Set
beats.subtitle: Six players and the Storyteller gather.

events.label: Setup
events.body: Bee is the Ojo, the starting Demon. Twob is the Lunatic. Koruto is the Amnesiac, Commando the Alchemist with a Wizard ability, Bumblebee the Wizard, and beep boop the Fisherman. Starlow runs the game as Storyteller. The grimoire is set; the first night approaches.

beats.title: Night 1: Wishes and the Cost
beats.subtitle: The Wizard wishes; the Amnesiac chooses the price.

events.label: Wizard wish
events.body: Bumblebee, the Wizard, wishes: "Each night, a different good player might swap alignments & characters with the Demon."

events.label: Amnesiac
events.body: Koruto is prompted to use their ability and does so. When asked to choose the cost of the Wizard's wish, Koruto says: "Every day, someone different and unique role is revealed by the Story Teller which is actually true."

events.label: Character swap
events.body: Bee and twob swapped characters on Night 1 due to Bumblebee's wish.

beats.title: Day 1: Revelation and Execution
beats.subtitle: The Amnesiac is revealed; the town votes.

events.label: Revelation
events.body: Day breaks. The Storyteller announces that Koruto is the Amnesiac. A nomination is made against Koruto.

events.label: Nomination & execution
events.body: Twob nominates Bumblebee. The town votes. Bumblebee is executed.

beats.title: Night 2: The Evil Saint Rises
beats.subtitle: The Ojo chooses; the Alchemist's wish reshapes the game.

events.label: Demon & kill
events.body: The Ojo (Bee) chooses the Lunatic. Bee dies in the night.

events.label: Alchemist Wizard wish
events.body: Commando, as Alchemist with the Wizard ability, wishes: "Starlow becomes the evil Saint." Starlow, the Storyteller, is given the character of the Evil Saint and enters the game.

beats.title: Day 2: The Saint Revealed
beats.subtitle: The cost of the first wish comes due; the Atheist claim and a surprise nomination.

events.label: Revealed role
events.body: Under the cost of Koruto's wish, a different and unique role is revealed by the Storyteller as true: Starlow is revealed as the Saint.

events.label: Fisherman consult
events.body: Beep asks for a consult on his Fisherman ability. He receives: "Keep claiming Atheist, and really try to sell that you are indeed the Atheist."

events.label: Atheist claim
events.body: Beep, after receiving his Fisherman information, keeps claiming it's an Atheist game and sells the claim hard.

events.label: Nomination & execution
events.body: Commando agrees and in hurry nominates Starlow. The town votes. Starlow is executed and marked dead as the Saint.

beats.title: Night 3: The Grim
beats.subtitle: The cost of the Alchemist's wish; only two remain.

events.label: Cost of Commando's wish
events.body: The cost of Commando's Wizard wish had been: "If you nominate the Storyteller, they become drunk." By nominating Starlow (the Storyteller), Starlow had become drunk. In what would have been good win due to saint execution, but due to commando nominating instead, the saint becomes drunk.

events.label: Demon kill
events.body: In the night, Commando is killed. Only two players are left alive. The game endsâ€”Evil wins!
